comments:
Eclipse 3.0M6

Window -> Preferences -> Workbench -> Keys

After changing the category a few times and looking at the names I cancelled 
the dialog (note that no values were entered or changed).  The exception below 
appeared in the log.  There was no effect in the application.  I cannot 
reproduce this error but thought that the stack trace may be helpful.
